title: Oil India to invest Rs 25,000 crore for net zero emissions by 2040
description: OIL's net zero plan includes a combination of cutting down the flaring of gas and commercialisation of stranded gas as well as setting up renewable electricity generation capacity, building green hydrogen plants and constructing biogas and ethanol plants.
